snippet.title: Shadows of a Sunless World - Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is the trailer of our game Shadows of a Sunless World.

It was a student project finishing our Master's degree at the CNAM-Enjmin school.

Here is the itch.io page : https://eva-abollivier.itch.io/shadows-of-a-sunless-world

Our team :
Alice Pinto - Technical artist and programmer
Ugo Belfiore - Gameplay Programmer
Timothée Degli Innocenti - Environment artist
Marine Furlan - Character and texture artist
Camilo Montes - Opening cutscene drawings
Nicolas Noël - Game and level designer
Eva Abollivier - Game and narrative designer
Robin Richard - Sound designer
Anaïtis de France - UX designer
Aymeric Manceau - Producer
